c.id, c.title, c.lesson_num AS lessonnum, c.price, c.cover, c.buy_count AS buyCount, c.view_count AS viewCount, c.status, c.gmt_create AS gmtCreate,
t.name AS teacherName,

course c LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id
